com.cubeia.firebase.api.action.local
Interface LocalAction

All Superinterfaces:
VisitableLocalAction
All Known Implementing Classes:
FilteredJoinAction, FilteredJoinCancelAction, FilteredJoinCancelResponseAction, FilteredJoinResponseAction, FilteredJoinTableAvailableAction, LocalServiceAction, LoginRequestAction, LoginResponseAction, PlayerQueryRequestAction, PlayerQueryResponseAction, SystemInfoRequestAction, SystemInfoResponseAction
public interface LocalAction
extends VisitableLocalAction

Interface for actions that are local to the client gateway node. I.e. they do not propagate over the cluster to any game implementation / services. They would however be allowed to propagate over other event-channels as needed. There is currently no visitor defined for these type of actions. Evaluate implementing this if the list grows.

Author:
Fredrik
